meanings.definition: To give someone the responsibility of doing something or of caring for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She entrusts her sister with taking care of her plants while she is on vacation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher entrusts the students with completing their homework assignments on time.
meanings.sent3: He entrusts his mischievous cat with guarding his favorite pair of socks.
meanings.sent4: The captain entrusts the ship's wheel to the experienced sailor during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The CEO entrusts the new employee with an important project to test their skills.
